BioCroValidation

BioCroValidation is a collection of tools for helping to validate BioCro crop growth models.

This package is a work in progress. As development proceeds, functions are subject to modification or removal without notice.

Installing the R Package

The easiest way to install BioCroValidation is to type the following from within an R terminal:

remotes::install_github('BioCro/BioCroValidation')

Note that this method requires the remotes package, which can be installed from within R by typing install.packages('remotes').

License

The BioCroValidation R package and its documentation are licensed under the MIT license.
